title: Chris Cosgrave
text:
Chris Cosgrave (born 24 July 2001) is an Irish <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player, currently playing for <a href="United%20Rugby%20Championship">United Rugby Championship</a> and <a href="European%20Rugby%20Champions%20Cup">European Rugby Champions Cup</a> side <a href="Leinster%20Rugby">Leinster</a>. His preferred position is <a href="Fullback%20%28rugby%20union%29">fullback</a>.
National team.
Cosgrave represents the <a href="Ireland%20national%20rugby%20sevens%20team">Ireland national rugby sevens team</a> on the <a href="World%20Rugby%20Sevens%20Series">World Rugby Sevens Series</a>. He debuted for the national sevens team in 2021.
